locked.description: Whether the configuration is not allowed to be overridden or extended.

indentWidth.description: Number of spaces per indentation level when not using tabs.

useTabs.description: Whether to use tabs for indentation.

binaryNextLine.description: Whether binary operators should be placed at the start of the next line when line wrapping occurs.

switchCaseIndent.description: Whether switch case bodies should be indented.

spaceRedirects.description: Whether to insert a space after redirection operators.

funcNextLine.description: Whether to place function opening braces on the next line.

minify.description: Whether to minify shell scripts when printing.
